div.p: Esko Public Schools would like to welcome you to our website! Feel free to explore and check out some of our features. Subscribe to our RSS feeds to receive updates on school district news and information!

div.div: Planning is taking place for a new crew of kindergarten students to join us in the fall. Please visit our kindergarten round-up page to find information about kindergarten in Esko. READ MORE... about Kindergarten Round-Up 2020
Esko public schools distance learning plan in response to the Covid-19 school closure can be found here READ MORE... about Distance Learning

Based on the closure of school for the month of April, Teacher Requests will be done differently this year. If you wish to request a teacher for your child for next year READ MORE... about Elementary Teacher Requests

Esko Public Schools is growing our Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and YouTube channels to celebrate our students, and share information keep parents, students, community and alumni in the loop as to what's happening in our schools. READ MORE... about Follow us on Social Media - #GoEsko

div.p:
When you walk through the main entry of the Esko High School, the slogan "IT"S A GREAT DAY TO BE AN ESKOMO" is painted for all to see. For more than 90 years, the school has been the window into the community for the outside world. From its consistently high academic ratings to its outstanding athletes, and from its band and choir to its many successful alumni, the school has been the first thing - often the only thing - people elsewhere know about Esko.
-Davis Helberg, Editor Esko's Corner An Illustrated History of Esko & Thompson Township and Esko class of 1958.
For information about the History of Esko Public Schools, the Esko Historical Society and Esko history book project, visit www.eskohistory.com

Esko Public Schools, ISD #99 does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. Esko Public Schools, ISD #99 does not necessarily endorse or recommend the materials that appear on linked sites as they are provided for convenience and neither controls or guarantees the accuracy, timeliness, relevance or completeness of outside information.
